sandra.libs.nlu.nlulib
Class NLU

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.speech.RecognitionListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, XMLAsyncResponse
Direct Known Subclasses:
GrammarTest
public abstract class NLU
extends ASR
implements XMLAsyncResponse

Processes the output of the speech recognizer either with a statistical or a handcrafted grammar obtaining its semantic interpretation.

Version:
2.0, 09/20/13
Author:
Zoraida Callejas, Michael McTear

Method Detail

initializeHandCrafted

public void initializeHandCrafted(java.lang.String XMLGrammarContent)
                           throws org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException,
                                  GrammarException
Parses the grammar into Java objects and converts them to a regular expression that it used in the other methods to validate phrases and obtain their semantics.

Parameters:
XMLGrammarContent - String with the handcrafted XML grammar
Throws:
org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException - When the XML does not follow the valid format
GrammarException - When there is any other exception //TODO
See Also:
6 for the valid XML format for hand-crafted grammars

getResultsHandCrafted

public java.lang.String getResultsHandCrafted(java.lang.String phrase)
                                       throws GrammarException
Validates a phrase using the handcrafted grammar. If it is valid, it returns its semantic representation in the form a String with all the items and their semantic values. If the phrase is not valid according the grammar, then it returns null.

Parameters:
phrase - String to be interpreted (usually it is the recognized phrase from the user's spoken input)
Returns:
Semantic interpretation if the phrase is valid, null if it is not.
Throws:
GrammarException - When there is a parsing error or the phrase is null.
See Also:
example of a semantic parsing for a phrase according to a sample grammar in Chapter 6

startStatistical

public void startStatistical(java.lang.String phrase)
                      throws GrammarException
Initiates the connection to the statistical NLU processing service.

Parameters:
phrase - String to be interprete
Throws:
GrammarException - If the phrase is null

processResultsFromStatistical

public abstract void processResultsFromStatistical(java.lang.String semantics)
Processes the results of the Maluuba service: a String semantics with the semantic. representation of the phrase used to start the service (see method startStatistical(phrase)).

connectToMaluuba

private void connectToMaluuba(java.lang.String phrase)
Initiates the connection to the Maluuba service for processing the phrase.

Parameters:
phrase - String to be interpreted using the Maluuba service.

processXMLContents

public void processXMLContents(java.lang.String semantics)
When the Maluuba service produces a result (the semantics of the phrase), it invokes the abstract method processResultsFromStatistical.

Specified by:
processXMLContents in interface XMLAsyncResponse
